DOC.brief_summary: The goal capture Quality life survival patient one year stay ICU . Data collect stay ICU evaluate . One year ICU stay patient send Quality Life questionnaire need fill return . All data evaluate together .
DOC.brief_title: Health Quality Life One Year After Discharge From Intensive Care Unit ( ICU )
DOC.criteria: patient least 5 day longer without interruption ICU patient less 4 day ICU
DOC.keyword: QoL Survival one year ICU stay
